title.narrative: UNESCO-Phoenix Satellite Television Holdings Limited Strategic Partnership Activities for a Culture of Peace Programme

description.narrative: A special edition of heritage protection in armed conflicts countries ( Libya, Afghanistan etc.) was made early 2013. Media partner of Hangzhou Conference in May 2013 with a special TV trailer for advertising the event. On 15 October, 2013, a special TV debate for celebrating the 10th Anniversary of the Convention for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage . Another special edition of TV debate on October 14th 2014, with the theme One Planet, One Ocean is under preparation. A serial of documentary films for celebrating 70th anniversary of UNESCO will be prepared and broadcast on Phoenix Channel and other TV in the world.
